titleStmt.title: A caueat for Archippus A sermon preached at a visitation at White-Chappel Church in London, Septemb. 23. 1618. By Ier. Dyke minister of Gods word at Epping in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Dyke, Jeremiah, 1584-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the great south-doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Also issued as part of: Two sermons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
